verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can feel you lifting off
The weight of the world
I can feel you lifting off
The weight of the world

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my joy, You are my joy
You are my joy, You are my joy (x2)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In You is all my hope and my peace
In You is all my hope and my peace (x2)
